summary:
Follower Woodelf, archer/bowgirl :) brown hair, blue eyes, serious face .. its my style !
Lvl 1 -> 100 follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Follower Woodelf archer/bowgirl :) brown hair, blue eyes, serious face .. its my style !
Lvl 1 -> 100 follower.

Based on my own character, sisters in game for story ..
can be found in \"sleeping giant\", \"Riverwood\" tavern.

[b]you will need:[/b]

-Better Females by Bella by BellaGail
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]LINK[/url]

-ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]LINK[/url]

-The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]LINK[/url]

and may be ..

-univision Face by DD AKT
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]LINK[/url]

[b]You can use the exellent :[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9504#content]Followers can Relax by King Coin[/url]
for behavior like Serana...
--------------------------------------------
Install :

Use NMM, or extract and put \"Eliween esp + bsa\" in your Skyrim/data folder, activate .. play !
--------------------------------------------

[b]For Elidie equipment (screen shot).[/b]

clic picture for link
Princess of the woods addons and alternative sexy textures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24310][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/SkyrilASE_link.jpg[/img][/url]

--------------------------------------------------------------------

My others creations :

Female Glassarmor and necklace
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34192][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/Glass_armor/armor_mini.jpg[/img][/url]

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Ebony sexy female UNP and standalone ebony Circlet 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32697][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/ebony/miniebony.jpg[/img][/url]

AURIEL AND DAWNBREAKER UP & COLORS
mod 1/ Change Auriel set and dawnbreaker colors / change la couleur du set Auriel et d\'aubeclat
mod 2/ increases bow and sword stats like daedric weapons / ameliore les stats de l\'arc et de l\'epee equivalent aux armes daedric
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32496/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32496/[/url]

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Personnal homage to Liv Tyler :)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/137810][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/Skyrim_%20liv_t_miniature.jpg[/img][/url]

Nellie redguard follower (tank with Dovakhiin shout) + savegame lvl 1
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30946][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/Nellie/Nellie_min.jpg[/img][/url]

Lydia more pretty (change Lydia face)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24176][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/lydia1min.jpg[/img][/url]

Aela more pretty (change Aela face)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24170][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/Aela2min.jpg[/img][/url]

--------------------------------------------

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

Thanks all users and modders !
[/center]
author: Elidid
